text: bharttrmatikalaya strikalum ninnalkku nisid'dhaman. ennal yud'dhattatavukarayi ninnalute adhinatayil vannavar itilninnealivan. itellam ninnalkkulla daivika niyamaman. ivarallatta strikaleyellam vivahamulyam nalki ninnalkk kalyanam kalikkavunnatan. ninnal vivahajivitam agrahikkunnuvarakanam. avihitavelca kanksikkunnavarakarut. annane avarumayi dampatyasukhamasvadiccal nirbandhamayum ninnalavarkk vivahamulyam nalkanam. vivahamulyam tirumaniccasesam ninnal parasparasam'matatteate valla vittuvilcayum ceyyunnuvenkil atil terrilla. allahu ellam ariyunnavanum yuktimanuman
